question: For which film did Bruce Dern receive an Academy Award nomination for Best Actor?

content: Question: For which film did Bruce Dern receive an Academy Award nomination for Best Actor?

<python>
# Search for films where Bruce Dern received an Academy Award nomination for Best Actor
for r in search_pages("Bruce Dern Academy Award nomination")[:5]:
    content = read_section(r['page_id'] + ":full")
    if "Best Actor" in content and "nomination" in content.lower():
        print(f"=== {r['title']} ===")
        print(content)
        # Extract the film title from the content
        # Look for patterns like "film", "movie", or "role"
        import re
        film_match = re.search(r"([A-Z][a-z]+(?:\s+[A-Z][a-z]+)*)\s*film", content)
        if film_match:
            film_title = film_match.group(1)
            print(f"Film: {film_title}")
            break
</python>

**Bruce MacLeish Dern** (born June 4, 1936) is an American actor. He has received several accolades, including the [Film Festival Award for Best Actor](Cannes)(Cannes Film Festival Award for Best Actor) and the [Bear for Best Actor](Silver)(Silver Bear for Best Actor). He was nominated for the [Award for Best Supporting Actor](Academy)(Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor) for *[Home](Coming)(Coming Home (1978 film))* (1978) and the [Award for Best Actor](Academy)(Academy Award for Best Actor) for *[Nebraska](Nebraska (film))* (2013). He is also a [Award](BAFTA)(BAFTA Award), two-time [Award](Genie)(Genie Awards), and three-time [Globe Award](Golden)(Golden Globe Awards) nominee.

A member of [Actors Studio](The)(The Actors Studio), he rose to prominence during the [Hollywood](New)(New Hollywood) era, through roles in films such as ''[Shoot Horses, Don't They?](They)(They Shoot Horses, Don't They? (film))* (1969), *[Incredible 2-Headed Transplant](The)(The Incredible 2-Headed Transplant)* (1971), *[Cowboys](The)(The Cowboys)*, *[Running](Silent)(Silent Running)*, and *[King of Marvin Gardens](The)(The King of Marvin Gardens)* (all 1972). Other notable films include *[Great Gatsby](The)(The Great Gatsby (1974 film))* (1974), *[Posse](Posse (1975 film))* (1975), *[Plot](Family)(Family Plot)* (1976), *[Sunday](Black)(Black Sunday (1977 film))* (1977), *[Driver](The)(The Driver)* (1978), *[Tattoo](Tattoo (1981 film))* (1981), *[Championship Season](That)(That Championship Season (1982 film))* (1982), *[Monster](Monster (2003 film))* (2003), *[Hateful Eight](The)(The Hateful Eight)* (2015), *[Artist's Wife](The)(The Arti
